text: Jaime Comas Gil is a Spanish screenwriter and film producer. He wrote the screenplay for Fistful of Dollars (1964) along A. Bonzzoni, Víctor Andrés Catena and Sergio Leone; Il cacciatore di squali (1979), directed by Enzo G. Castellari; and La sfinge d'oro (1967) along Raphael Sanchez Campoy, Adriano Bolzoni and José Antonio Biondi. He founded Ocean Films. ==Filmography== ==References== ==External links== * Category:Date of birth missing (living people) Category:Spanish screenwriters Category:Spanish film producers Category:Living people
title: Jaime Comas
